page.title: 12RIDING ON MENDIP
page.content: There are many places for one to ride on the Mendips. Bracken,rough grass and heather make excellent ground for galloping. The main open riding areas are around Cheddar,Draycott, Rodney Stoke,Crooks Peak and the top of the Gorge.Riding in other parts is restricted to bridle ways. The local Pony Club has over 160 active members.They have a camp in summer and numerous rallies and inter_branch events. Race horses are trained along the long,flat grass leading to Crooks Peak.Several farms have riding stables and offer lessons.
